basic.description: This course provides knowledge of a scripting language that serves as a front-end to many popular packages and frameworks, along with a compiled language such as C++.  Topics include the practical use of an object-oriented scripting and compiled language for scientific programming applications. There is a laboratory component for the course; concepts learned are illustrated in several science applications.
basic.subject: ISC
basic.title: Programming for Science Applications

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: MAC 2312, COP 3014 or ISC 3313 or approved programming course.
